column6: INHUMANITY TIE-IN! – "THE HUMANITY BOMB" CHAPTER TWO! Which one of Banner's lab assistants has fallen to the Terrigen Mists--and how has it changed them? HULK vs. IRON MAN and the X-MEN'S BEAST for the fate of the world!
column8: | penciller (cover):Mahmud Asrar | artist:Clay Mann | writer:Mark Waid
